item.title: [HELP] Help with adding wild into a Delta source!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

This is your code -

absX >= 2670 && absX <= 2633 && absY >= 4560 && absY <= 4597

How can X be more than 2670, but less then 2633?

Change it to this -

absX >= 2633 && absX <= 2670 && absY >= 4560 && absY <= 4597

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Help with adding wild into a Delta source!
item.dc:creator: @k0j0e k0j0e
item.description:
@k0j0e wrote:

look…

}

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if (Type == 1) {
		if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2670 && absX <= 2633 && absY >= 4560 && absY <=4597 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) {
			return true;
			}

the || absX >= 2670 && absX <= 2633 && absY >= 4560 && absY <=4597 is the place that i want to put wild… its the place where we kill the jungle demon in the real rs…

when i compile and run my server… it still a normal area… its not wild…

any help please?

Read full topic
